programme.title: Player in Kaohsiung (M) Ep5152
programme.desc: The name Kaohsiung has entered into a century of history since it has been renamed from Da Gou. This year, the National Day fireworks will be held again in Kaohsiung after 20 years passed. SETI has specially produced a new travelogue for Kaohsiung, leading the audience to visit the most popular, charming, and unique places in Kaohsiung. Through the lens, the century-old glory of Kaohsiungs [One-Hundred] is presented profoundly. The new season of "Player in Kaohsiung" invites many hosts and celebrities, including Yao Yao, Chang Chin Lan, Daniel Chen, David Wu, Ada Chang, Fay Wu, and Kua Kua, visit the 38 administrative districts of Kaohsiung to explore the sensational stories of the people in the alleys, deeply explore the professional spirit of the Greater Kaohsiung area, the traditions and customs of the aboriginal people, the living beside the farms and ports, and the humanism nurtured by Kaohsiungs century-old history.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep112
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1020
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep15
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep863864
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep687
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep463
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Happy Enemy(M) Ep67
programme.desc: Pei-Pei Wu and Yu-Hsuan Lee have been comparing with each other since childhood. They had a crush on each other but later became rivals because of an accident. They both wished each other would disappear from their lives; however, they are neighbors. Pei-Pei and Yu-Hsuan have been fighting, yet they inevitably fell into the destined love with each other. If fighting against each other is a way of communication and caring, then these quarrelsome lovers are getting closer and growing together. When they gradually start to let go of their competitive attitude that is full of hostility, they even start to click with each other!

programme.title: Princess & 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: Let It Ghost
programme.desc: The movie consists of three urban ghost stories: when a film crew is haunted by a ghost, the director decides to cast her to play the ghost; when a taxi driver takes his girlfriend to a staycation, a horny ghost adds spice to it; a wandering child ghost refuses to leave a mall that is to be demolished, so the tenants help her to move on.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the Gang of Five in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Missbehavior
programme.desc: A group of friends who are formerly close but now somewhat estranged, unite to help one of their own who is in trouble at work. In this hilarious comedy, the friends must find a replacement bottle of breast milk before the end of the day as chaos breaks out!

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Integrity
programme.desc: Anti-corruption senior officer Chen lines up a key witness, corporate accountant Jack, to testify against a tobacco trading company CEO for bribing high-level customs officer as well as smuggling contraband cigarettes. When neither Jack nor the CEO shows up on the day of the hearing, Chen must team up with his ex-wife to launch an investigation.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Seven friends get together and decide to play a game where they must share all the messages, calls and app notifications on each other's cell phones. Hilarity and drama follows as everyone's secrets are unveiled throughout the evening, and the seven friends find themselves more like strangers to each other than ever before!

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Love · Revolution
programme.desc: Ai Yoshida will do anything for love, including traveling to Thailand with her boyfriend from Japan to run dope. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the local gangster after a brawl at a bar, Ai sets out on a rescue mission that sends her on an action-packed roller-coaster ride where she meets a professional assassin who breaks out of jail for love.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Protege
programme.desc: Undercover Police Nick has spent 8 years working for the drug baron Quin, so as to collect evidence of his drug trafficking activities. After gaining Quins trust, Nick becomes his protg and succeeds him as the drug baron when Quin retires. However, Nick has lost himself in his split life between trading drugs and searching for criminal evidence.

programme.title: Justice Sung Sai Kit
programme.desc: An actor who portrayed the famous Justice Sung Sai Kit is sent back in time to the Qing dynasty after he meets a mysterious woman. There, he reprises his role as a lawyer and sets out to protect the poor from the wealthy. However, as time travelling is outlawed, the time-travel police are on the hunt to stop the duo from changing history.

programme.title: Kung Fu Chefs
programme.desc: After being ousted from the clan, disgraced chef Wong encounters cooking prodigy Lung and takes him on as a new disciple in his new restaurant. With the Top Chef competition coming up, it's now up to Lung to reclaim his master's honour, even if the other side is not fighting fair

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: Donnie Yen plays a Hong Kong police officer who is highly skilled in martial arts but balloons to more than 200 pounds after his fianc left him. His boss can only assign simple tasks to him like escorting a criminal to Japan, but can he complete it?

programme.title: I Corrupt All Cops
programme.desc: During the time when Hong Kong was under British rule, there was a dark age when corruption and bribery were the order of the day. But in the darkness comes brave individuals who are determined to end corruption with the founding of Hong Kong's anti-corruption bureau in this star-studded crime drama that features Tony Leung Ka Fai, Anthony Wong, Eason Chan and Alex Fong.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Henry Chen, a former soldier, is recruited for his toughest mission yet - teaching a class of teen delinquents. As he kicks his way into their school and home lives, it becomes clear that his unconventional teaching style might be just what they need.

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: The Sunny Side of the Street
programme.desc: Hassan is a Pakistani refugee boy whose father has died in a car accident. A local taxi driver, Yat, then helps him flee Hong Kong. In the process, the two gradually develop a father-son relationship, until Hassan discovers the shocking truth about his fathers death

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: New Kung Fu Cult Master 2
programme.desc: In this sequel, Zhang Wu Ji successfully rescued the Six Major sects at Dadu. Nevertheless, the quest for the Dragon Sabre continues as Wu Ji and his three girlfriends set sail for Ice Fire Island. After a series of vicious fights, they finally unveil the secret behind the Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: An epic historic adventure set during the turbulent times of the Three Kingdoms. Cao Cao attempts to enlist Guan Yun Chang into his forces, but Guan is loyal to his sworn brother Liu Bei, who is also Caos enemy. As Guan tries to rescue Liu Beis concubine from Cao, he is forced to fight his way through. Can he succeed in the end?

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: Japanese director Inoue Umetsugu takes on the glitzy world of nightclub performers in The Yellow Muffler. The film depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching-ping (Irene Chen I-ling) and Pai-hung (Betty Ting Pei) and ends when they are cast in a new movie.

programme.title: The Kid With A Tattoo
programme.desc: Young Bao Tong witnesses the brutal murder of his kung fu master by a vicious villain. A large eagle tattoo on Baos chest was spotted by the killer as he escapes. Can Bao escape from the killer?

programme.title: Tragic Commitment
programme.desc: When the husband of a doctor, Tung is fatally wounded in an accident, he reveals to her about his affair with Blackie, who is impregnated with his baby. Despite the devastation of the betrayal and the eventual death of her husband, Tung is pressured by her mother-in-law into putting up with Blackie and offer $1M for her baby...

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf to win the lantern contest, while Zhao plans for revenge. When Longs wife suddenly disappears one day and he hears about the story of human lanterns, Long suspects Zhao may be involved in the incident

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the walls?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by Drunken Master, this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Disciples of the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: In the finale of this trilogy, Gordon Liu reprises his famous role, Monk San Te, as he tries to protect Fang Shih Yu, an arrogant youth who gets into trouble with the Qing officials, and nearly lands Shaolin Temple into trouble too.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Tang Peng Nan are a sweet couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan at a time when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he found that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: Usurpers Of Emperor's Power
programme.desc: The last ruler of Tang, Li Yao (Chen Chia-chi) is deposed by Chao Kuang-jun (Wang Jung), the founder of the Sung Dynasty. Unfortunately his actions unleash a new plague - his brother Kuang-yi (Chao Kuo) - on the courts and his people. The marauding Kuang-yi rapes and plunders. As more people get involved, it turns into a bloody battlefield of betrayal. It is up to upright officials like Li Lang (Liu Yung) to put an end to it. But can one man take on the imperial army?

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: Martial Club
programme.desc: The young Wong Fei Hung and his friend Wang Yin Lin offend the young master of another rival school and the expert they hire, causing both martial arts schools to fight against each other. This is Director Liu Chia Liangs masterpiece and one of the top ten highest grossing movies in 1981.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Opium And The Kung-Fu Master
programme.desc: Tie Qiao San, head of the Ten Guangdong Tigers, is an honourable master with many disciples. As opium becomes popular among the nobles, Tie starts taking it and gradually harms his body. When an opium houses owner defeats Tie in a fight and he is only saved from being killed by his disciple, Tie vows to quit opium and get back on his feet.

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s a-go-go era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: The Jade Raksha
programme.desc: A fearsome swordswoman known as The Jade Raksha appears in the martial arts world and begins killing people whose surname is Yan. A swordsman figures out who she is and asks her why. Apparently a Yan killed her family 18 years ago and she only has vengeance on her mind

programme.title: Forbidden Tales of Two Cities
programme.desc: Li Han-hsiang wrote and directed this charming and fascinating comedy, Forbidden Tales Of Two Cities. The two cities in the picture are Macau, where a love quartet is a morally-unsound source for sexual entertainment; and Hong Kong, where a woman enters a gamblers apartment to find four shackles hanging from his ceiling to aid in kinky activities.

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A professors assistant stole a micro-film storing the secret of a newly invented nuclear reactor and sells it to a crime syndicate. However, the micro-film accidentally falls into the hands of a nightclub dancer and a thief in the process, leading to them being relentlessly pursued by the crime syndicate to retrieve the micro-film.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: Murderer Pursues
programme.desc: Wang Chung was a valued actor long before he became a director, but as a filmmaker, he helped create some of the most interesting thrillers Shaw Brothers ever released - including this fascinating crime saga of a Sino-Vietnamese crime gang. Danny Lee stars as a misunderstood refugee while Ray Lui plays a cop struggling against his own conscience to ensure that justice is upheld.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlords daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insiders look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiangs popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: Holy Flame of the Martial World
programme.desc: This internationally popular tale of a brother and sister, seeking vengeance for the death of their parents through using the mythical yin/yang Holy Flame kung-fu technique. It's an outstanding epic choreographed and co-starring lead "Venom" Kuo Chue (aka. Philip Kwok).

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans S1 Ep21
programme.desc: You'll Do - With no memory of the night before, Lasalle's brother, Cade, turns to NCIS for help when he finds his girlfriend's body in the trunk of his car. Lasalle is determined to prove his brother's innocence.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep69
programme.desc: A boy claims the police told him that he would go to jail if he did not admit to an act of vandalism at school. A woman says she was going through a hard time, so she borrowed money from a friend.

programme.title: Judge Judy S23 Ep70
programme.desc: A newlywed's list of emotional wedding moments that were allegedly ruined by her DJ when he played the wrong songs. A woman discovers her wages are garnished to satisfy her husband's child support payments

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Ray Ferrier is a divorced dockworker and estranged from his two children of whom he has custody on weekends.

programme.desc: Runaway - Onboard theU.S.S. Discovery, Ensign Tilly (Mary Wiseman) encounters an unexpected visitor in need of help. However, this unlikely pair may have more in common than meets the eye.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show S3 Ep70

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep8
programme.desc: All In - Following a hunch, Captain Burnham tracks Book to an old haunt from their courier days and gets drawn into a high-stakes competition for a powerful weapon.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Rubicon - Captain Burnham and the U.S.S. Discovery race to stop Book and Ruon Tarka from launching a rogue plan that could inadvertently endanger the galaxy.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep10
programme.desc: The Galactic Barrier - Captain Burnham and her crew must go where few have gone before: beyond the Galactic Barrier. Meanwhile, Book learns the truth of what drives Ruon Tarka.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Rosetta - While Captain Burnham leads an away mission to a planet that was once home to the aliens responsible for the DMA, Book and Tarka secretly infiltrate the U.S.S. Discovery.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Species Ten-C - As the DMA approaches Earth and Ni'Var, Captain Burnham and the crew of the U.S.S. Discovery attempt to make First Contact with the powerful species responsible before it's too late.

programme.title: Star Trek: Discovery S4 Ep13
programme.desc: Coming Home - With evacuations underway, Burnham and the team aboard the U.S.S. Discovery must find a way to communicate and connect with a species far different from their own before time runs out.

programme.title: Beneath
programme.desc: An emotionally scarred young woman returns to her hometown, where, she believes, her sister died some years earlier under mysterious circumstances.

programme.title: The Roast of Bruce Willis
programme.desc: Roast of Bruce Willis - Bruce Willis goes from 'Die Hard' to dead on arrival as some of the biggest names in entertainment serve up punches of their own to Hollywood's go-to action star.

programme.title: Alternatino with Arturo Castro S1
programme.desc: The Neighbor - Arturo feels conflicted about getting help from a neighbor, an ayahuasca ceremony goes off the rails, and things get complicated for two warriors in a fantastical realm.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After a series of mysterious deaths befalls their small town, an offbeat group of friends.

programme.title: Playmaker
programme.desc: A former footballer and jailbird, Ivo is no longer interested in football. That is until he meets Lukas, a talented young player, and decides to help him pursue a professional career. But his criminal past soon catches up with him.

programme.title: Irina
programme.desc: Stuck in poverty and desperate to make ends meet, Irina decides to become a surrogate mother. As the baby grows inside her, she must accept that she will have to part with it forever, and she discovers what it means to love and forgive.

programme.title: The Devil Inside
programme.desc: Catherine is the head of a parole agency, a wife and a mother. When a 20-years-old charismatic inmate is released on parole, she finds herself ensnared in a sordid affair with him. Their unbridled passion unleashes dangerous consequences for both.

programme.title: Otar's Death
programme.desc: Keti and her son Nika find themselves in huge trouble when he hits an old man with his car. With the victims family threatening to press charges, Keti must find a way to raise a huge sum of money or Nika might go to prison.

programme.title: My Little Sister
programme.desc: Set in Russia during WWII, little Yamil impatiently awaits the day that his father, whom he has never seen, can return home from battle. One day, mother brings home a traumatized orphan girl Oksana. Yamil finds comfort and hope in loving her as a sister.

programme.title: The Grump: In Search Of An Escort
programme.desc: The Grump, a stubborn old Finnish farmer, goes on a quest to find a replacement for his beloved second-hand car. He goes to Germany to do so, but ends up settling accounts with his past.

programme.title: Murders in Toulouse
programme.desc: Several corpses are found scattered across Toulouse, with evidence strangely linked to a particular songs lyrics. Captain Keller, a veteran inspector ravaged by an illness, teams up with a young officer, who has secrets of her own, to solve the case.

programme.title: Golden Men
programme.desc: Based on a true story. A star-studded heist film with a comedic edge, Golden Men follows a group of desperate men in Turin who attempt an armoured truck robbery.

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.desc: Two investigators with a painfully linked past are forced to team up to solve a mysterious murder which involves a carved stone dating back more than 40,000 years. They soon discover that the very thing that connects them might just solve the case.

programme.desc: A familys holiday in Tunisia ends in disaster, when their 10-year-old son Aziz is shot during a terrorist ambush. At the hospital where Aziz is in desperate need of a transplant, the family discovers a long-buried secret.

programme.title: Road To Your Heart
programme.desc: In this sweet road-trip movie, Basson, a young businessman journeys to Cape Town for his fathers funeral and to fulfill certain tasks in the will. He meets bohemian Amory along the way and they encounter hilarious moments, disappointments and heartaches.

programme.title: Symphony Of The Office
programme.desc: Stuck in a monotonous job with an annoying boss, his colleague Bella is the only reason making Christopher stay. But when she is offered a job elsewhere, Christopher must come to terms with his feelings for her before she leaves.

programme.title: Commitment Asli

programme.title: Tim Burton's Corpse Bride
programme.desc: Returning to the painstaking stop-motion animation he employed with amazing success in The Nightmare Before Christmas, Tim Burton presents a hair-raising legend based on a 19th-century Russian folktale, in which a young man mistakenly weds a corpse while on a two-day trek to the village of his real bride-to-be. It is up to the groom's flesh-and-blood fiance, who has been pining for the arrival of her intended, to face her wraith-like rival and make peace with her by promising to live her dreams for her and by vowing to remember her always. Only then are the living bride and groom free to proceed with their own wedding ceremony in the warmhearted fable Tim Burton's Corpse Bride.

programme.desc: Penny tries to seduce an abstaining Leonard in an attempt to ruin his plan to be a sperm donor for her ex-boyfriend.While Howard, Bernadette, Raj & Anu board the "Vomit Comet."

And later, a panel of esteemed educators offers no help to tonight's stammering loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q spread the love as attendants in a bridal dress shop much to the dismay of the brides-to-be, and break a sacred guy-code in the process. Plus, they attempt to sway frightened focus groups with fragrance campaigns that truly stink. Then the punishment takes an unexpected and never before seen twist when the big loser wonders if he's too old to get a visit from the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 6
programme.desc: It's spa day for the Jokers, although for them it's anything but relaxing. Then at the park, Sal reveals his secret identity while discussing the "birds-and-bees" of dolphins. Plus, surprised strangers wish they could have their "penny" back for sharing their thoughts. Finally, the big loser finds himself a little over dressed, and at the last minute has the runway pulled out from under him.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. Then, the clock is ticking during a time sensitive challenge in the park. And finally, tonight's big loser thinks he can sing and dance his way out of his punishment.

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: Fearlessly hurtling down the track, careening around, over and through the competition in his thundering Mach 5, Speed Racer was born to race cars. But when Speed turns down a lucrative offer from Royalton Industries, he not only infuriates the company's maniacal owner but uncovers a terrible secret some of the biggest races are being fixed by a handful of ruthless moguls! The only way for Speed to save his family's business and the sport he loves is to beat Royalton at his own game. With the support of his family and his loyal girlfriend, Trixie, Speed teams with his one-time rival the mysterious Racer X to win the race that took his brother, Rex Racer's, life: the death-defying, cross-country rally known as The Crucible.

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: Conflict lies ahead for Spider-Man, with the emergence of Electro, a foe far more powerful than he is, and the return of his old friend, Harry Osborn.

programme.title: Friends S8 1
programme.desc: Monica and Chandler's wedding reception is almost upstaged.

programme.title: Friends S8 2
programme.desc: Monica and Phoebe speculate about who might be the father of pregnant Rachel's baby.

programme.title: Friends S8 3
programme.desc: Everyone seems to know who the father of Rachel's unborn baby is.

programme.title: Friends S8 4
programme.desc: Ross and Rachel's attempt to explain to everyone how they ended up in bed together.

programme.title: Friends S8 5
programme.desc: Ross is horrified to learn that Rachel is going on a date with a handsome actor.

programme.title: Arrow S1 18
programme.desc: An angry resident of The Glades who calls himself The Savior (CHRISTOPHER REDMAN) embarks on a kidnapping and killing spree inspired by Arrows vigilantism.

programme.title: Arrow S1 19
programme.desc: When The Count (SETH GABEL) escapes from the mental institution and the city is flooded with Vertigo-related violence, Oliver and Diggle make it their mission to track him down.

programme.title: Arrow S1 20
programme.desc: Deadshot returns to Starling City, and Diggle's determined to see his brother's killer dead -- with or without Oliver's help.

programme.title: Arrow S1 21
programme.desc: When Felicity discovers a lead that might lead to Walters whereabouts, Oliver gambles that Felicity can be counted on in the field for the first time.

programme.title: Arrow S1 22
programme.desc: With the Undertaking only days away, Malcolm dons his black hood, while Oliver must outwit and/or outfight the Dark Archer in order to save the city.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 6
programme.desc: Mick takes the Waverider and Kayla to try and find Sara, but these enemies find themselves needing each other to survive after landing on the possible planet Sara is being held captive.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 7
programme.desc: With Ava a wreck, Behrad and the Legends make a last-ditch effort to keep Sara from being abducted in the first place, even knowing that it will alter the timeline.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 8
programme.desc: With everyone finally back together, the Legends find themselves looking to Nate to keep everything calm while in the old West on a mission to find an alien.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 9
programme.desc: Behrad is disappointed because the Legends have forgotten his birthday, so when they track an alien pod to 2024 and wind up on his favorite television sitcom, he thinks it's really a surprise for him.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 10
programme.desc: Obsessed with getting his powers back, Constantine (MATT RYAN) and Spooner go on a quest to find the Fountain of Imperium and find themselves at the end of the Spanish Civil War.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 4
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr and Sal get themselves into some hairy predicaments at the beauty supply store. Then, they discover that a language barrier adds to the awkwardness during a text message challenge in Time's Square. And later, a panel of esteemed educators offers no help to tonight's stammering loser.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 5
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q spread the love as attendants in a bridal dress shop much to the dismay of the brides-to-be, and break a sacred guy-code in the process. Plus, they attempt to sway frightened focus groups with fragrance campaigns that truly stink. Then the punishment takes an unexpected and never before seen twist when the big loser wonders if he's too old to get a visit from the tooth fairy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 6
programme.desc: It's spa day for the Jokers, although for them it's anything but relaxing. Then at the park, Sal reveals his secret identity while discussing the "birds-and-bees" of dolphins. Plus, surprised strangers wish they could have their "penny" back for sharing their thoughts. Finally, the big loser finds himself a little over dressed, and at the last minute has the runway pulled out from under him.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 7
programme.desc: Joe, Murr, Sal and Q network their way into some very uncomfortable business conversations, and go head to head in a photography presentation that's anything but picture perfect. Then, the clock is ticking during a time sensitive challenge in the park. And finally, tonight's big loser thinks he can sing and dance his way out of his punishment.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 8
programme.desc: The Jokers make some tough calls at a telemarketing agency that leave everyone wondering if they're just phoning it in. Then the guys' intentions get wishy-washy at a fountain in the mall. Plus, Q and Sal tap into their spiritual side when they catchsome dreams down at the shore. And the big loser of the night has his tour dampened by the other Jokers.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: What do you get when you cross toxic waste with a bunch of exotic spiders?.. Eaten!.. The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. And their hungry! When the alarm is sounded, it's then up to mining engineer Chris McCormack and Sheriff Sam Parker to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople, including the Sheriff's young son, Mike, her daughter, Ashley and paranoid radio announcer Harlan Griffith and Deputy Pete Willis into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S1 1
programme.desc: After witnessing a mob hit in the series premiere episode, Thony cleans the crime scene to stay alive, then begins a double life cleaning for the mob while doing what it necessary to save her son.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 7
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori go for the gold - but find something even better. Jesse takes a swing at Team Brandori, while T- Money does some dangerous bidding of his own. But when the dust settles, will Scott and Chrissy drive away with the golden prize?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 8
programme.desc: In one of the most unusual big money auctions yet, Sean auctions the contents of abandoned big-rigs. Scott and Jesse go head to head over a space age haul, while Brandon and Lori take a chance on a battle-ready rig. Meanwhile, Papa Bear goes all in for some vintage fun stuff - and he isn't in the mood to play games.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 9
programme.desc: It's wheels up for Papa Bear when he takes a gamble on a mysterious covered item. Meanwhile, the newcomer Alvarado brothers find an unusual collectible hiding in plain sight -- but are they going to flush their money down the toilet? And Brandon andLori find out whether a pet bin will turn out to be their best friend.

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: When in November 1970 a plane crash kills the coach and the players of the Marshall University Football team, students rally to convince the board of governors to participate in the 1971 season. Now the college president must find a coach, who then must find players.

programme.title: Shoot 'Em Up
programme.desc: Mr. Smith, the angriest, most hardboiled man in the world, finds himself entrusted to protect the most innocent thing of all--a newborn child. When Smith delivers the baby in the middle of a gunfight, he soon discovers that the infant is the target of a shadowy force that has sent a team of mysterious and endless assailants, led by Hertz, to erase all traces of the baby. Amid a hail of bullets and facing every conceivable permutation of gunfight, Smith teams up with a prostitute named DQ to solve the mystery as to why the baby's life is being threatened before this makeshift family all ends up on the wrong side of a bullet. Everyone wants the baby dead. The big question is why?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S4 10
programme.desc: Does Big Bear mean Big Money? The Alvarados get sneaky while Desert Dan horses around, and frustration gets the best of Brandori. Do they strike gold or strike out? As Jesse crushes dreams, who will go home empty-handed?

When Klinger discovers that he forgot to send in a stolen goods report on the camera his guilt sends him looking in the black market area. He finds the camera and is promptly picked up by the M.P.s as a thief.

programme.desc: Three Amigos - Maurice and Holling are saddled with their dead friend Bill's wife, who insists on accompanying them to his final resting place. With Rob Morrow.

programme.desc: Lost & Found - Joel encounters the ghost of a man who committed suicide in his cabin 40 years ago; Maurice is visited by his former commanding officer.

The camera was a gift from a father to the duo, who saved the life of his son. Charles completely bungles Klingers defense and Hawkeye and B.J. must plan a clever trap to catch the real thief and free their friend. The two doctor-detectives even go so far as to get a Polaroid of the guilty man, taken with the stolen camera, of course.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep07
programme.desc: Underbelly - Three homicide victims with matching tattoos lead Stabler and Beck to an underage prostitution ring. With the victims' pimp as the prime suspect, detectives must rely on one of his girls to testify against him.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep08
programme.desc: Cage - Stabler and Beck investigate a car accident involving two foster children in which the driver was fired from being a foster parent.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep12
programme.desc: Fools And Their Money - Sam believes he is acting in Woodys best interest and tries to keep him from losing his lifes savings, but his intentions go awry when Woody wins big and Sam is left to explain the losses.

programme.title: Cheers S4 Ep13
programme.desc: Take My ShirtPlease - Sam donates his old baseball jersey to a celebrity auction and recalls his days of "stardom." When no one bids on the shirt, he is forced to admit that his days of glory are far behind him.

programme.title: Shogun S1 Ep03
programme.desc: Part 3 - A British sea captain becomes an honored Samurai after being shipwrecked in 17th century Japan. An epic mini-series that is a blend of politics, romance, history, culture, religion and high adventure.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep04
programme.desc: Harry And Daphne - Harry Bentley's new girlfriend Daphne appears to be insinuating her way into his life, much to his chagrin. Meanwhile, George plots to bribe the building inspector.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep05
programme.desc: Jefferson vs. Jefferson - George and Louise's anniversary bicycle ride leads to a minor collision and a legal summons for George. But Louise insists on telling the truth rather than corroborating George's shaky account of the incident.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Mother Jefferson's Fall - Upset that George, Louise, and Lionel aren't paying attention to her while she's visiting their apartment, Mother Jeffersons fakes a fall to command their attention.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Movin' On Down - George feels that his fortunes are taking a turn for the worse when his business is making less profit and his banker won't return his calls.

programme.title: The Jeffersons S2 Ep08
programme.desc: Uncle Bertram - Mother Jefferson is upset over an encounter with an elevator masher, who turns out to be Tom Willis' elderly Uncle Bertram, a retired firefighter in town to visit his relatives.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Our Tribe - Joel unintentionally insults Marilyn's tribe and can make amends only by going through the tribal initiation process; Holling closes the Brick.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep12
programme.desc: Things Become Extinct - Because his family has a 120-year life expectancy, Holling faces a midlife crisis at age 63; Ed films a documentary on the art of flutemaking.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep13
programme.desc: Burning Down The House - During an unexpected visit from her mother, Maggie's house burns down and she learns her parents are divorcing; Joel helps the town chimney sweep.

programme.title: Northern Exposure S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Democracy in America - During the mayoral election, Holling runs for re-election against an angry woman, Joel is appointed commissioner, and Ed votes for the first time.

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles - Sherlock Holmes Ep01
programme.desc: Part I - The latest incumbent of the family home, Baskerville Hall, is haunted by a legend. Some 200 years ago, his ancestor Hugo De Baskerville was savagely killed by a huge, demonic hound.

programme.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles - Sherlock Holmes Ep02
programme.desc: Part II - The latest incumbent of the family home, Baskerville Hall, is haunted by a legend. Some 200 years ago, his ancestor Hugo De Baskerville was savagely killed by a huge, demonic hound.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep19
programme.desc: Nymphs Just Want to Have Fun - When a demon attacks and kills one of the three nympths that protect a lake, the Charmed ones try to help. However, once the demon is destroyed, the nypmphs decide Paige should replace the fallen nymph.

programme.title: Charmed S5 Ep20
programme.desc: Sense and Sense Ability - In order to get close to baby Wyatt, the Crone steals one of the senses from each of the Charmed Ones, in an attempt to fool the child. The Charmed Ones run into major complications without their senses.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-O S1 Ep01
programme.desc: Full Fathom Five - Steve McGarrett is assigned by the governor to break up a confidence racket that is billing rich visiting widows of their fortunes. Determined to fight fire with fire, Danny Williams signs on for a cruise, using a fellow policewoman as bait.

programme.desc: - - - When an aspiring chef lands a dream job at her idol's restaurant, she befriends the handsome executive chef. After they are both wrongly fired from there, the duo decides to open their own eatery to prove their food is better.

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep04

programme.title: Bewitched S3 Ep05
programme.desc: A Most Unusual Wood Nymph - Gerry O'Toole, a beautiful Irish girl who is a friend of Darrin's aunt arrives for a visit and announces she plans to stay with the Stephens until she gets a job.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep09
programme.desc: Choreographed - A woman is found dead and Warner can find no apparent reason for her death. Stabler begins the investigation and unravels a case of drugs, infidelity and an elaborate plot that impacts everyone involved.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep10
programme.desc: Scheherezade - A dying lung cancer pateint makes a deathbed confession to Benson, revealing crimes that took place decades ago, including the murder of his partner and how he took his partner's daughter to raise as his own.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S8 Ep11
programme.desc: Burned - The Sennet couple will stop at nothing to get custody of their daughter Tessa. Stabler and Benson have to sort through the lies that ends up leaving one of the parents in a grave medical state.

programme.title: Race Across the World S3 Ep2
programme.desc: The race to St John's continues as the five teams leave Haida Gwaii and head into the heart of the Yukon towards the second checkpoint, the former gold rush boom town Dawson City.

programme.title: Griff's Canadian Adventure S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Coldness - British comedian and travel enthusiast Griff Rhys Jones explores the Frozen Wilds of Manitoba, North Canada, and visits a town that sometimes has more polar bears than people.

programme.title: Changing Planet S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Liz Bonnin travels to California to learn about the increasing wildfires. Ade Adepitan travels to Kenya to look at rising climate temperatures, and Gordon Buchanan is in Brazil looking for jaguars.

programme.title: Greta Thunberg: A Year To Change the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Greta sets off to the annual World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland, which will be attended by world leaders, to call for action on climate change.

programme.title: Climate Change: Ade On The Frontline S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Bangladesh and Bhutan - In Bangladesh and Bhutan, Ade sees the damage that climate change is causing and finds out how we can fight it - and how a whole country can go carbon negative.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. Every year on the short grass plains, the wildebeest migration stops for weeks while the females give birth. Then the entire herd begins to move again, heading back north towards the Mara River, where crocodiles lie in wait for an annual feast.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Movin on Up - Best buds Valentino, Madara and Utris are ready for the next stage of forest school. Baby Clarita is at long last reunited with her mother. And toddler Mema discovers a tasty treat inside a rotten log (it can happen!).

programme.title: Kingdom of the Tide
programme.desc: Kingdom of the Tide - Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. Its a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Fickle River - Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Refugees of Laikipia - The mass relocation of an endangered species of Hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta, so the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Wild Stallions of the Himalayas - The high altitude Ladakh plateau in northwest India is a land of extremes. The air is thin and the mountain landscape treacherous; winters are freezing, while summers are scorching hot. The Tibetan wild ass is king of these grasslands, and one old stallion has developed a way to stay one step ahead of his rivals. We follow Dorje as he shadows a herd of females and foals, from winter to summer, when he will get his chance to sire the next generation. But to win his prize he must eventually do battle with other stallions - all wanting his crown!

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Crocs and Hippos of Ndumo - The Nile crocodile and hippopotamus are two of Africas amphibious freshwater icons, found in waterways, rivers and lakes across the continent, including the stunning wilderness of Kwa-Zulu Natal in South Africa. These two species have co-existed for thousands of years, evolving in different ways to a life aquatic.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Short Grass Plains - The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migrationthe crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Return to the Mara - Wildlife expert and Safari guide Jean Du Plessis is in the south of the Serengeti plains to witness the largest mass birth on the planet. programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep3
programme.desc: White Rhinos of Enasoit - The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: Nomads of the Serengeti 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Short Grass Plains - The Serengeti plains echo the sound of two million wildebeest. Over the course of the year, the giant herd migrates from the north to the south and back again in an endless circle. Watch the most treacherous part of the migrationthe crossing of the Mara River.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Blood and Dust - Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Fugitive Giants - With elephant numbers on the rise, so too are the conflicts Ol Pejeta has to deal with, like a gang of crop-raiding Pachyderms. The order is given to detusk three of the problem animals, but first the team will have to remove a collar from a blind elephant.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Tides of Sweetwater - A look at the plight of chimpanzees that survive the bush meat trade to become captive animals. At the same time, we look at the reintroduction of colobus monkeys into the Ewaso river area of Ol Pejeta.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Carcassonne - Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears - This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Gardens in the Clouds - The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured peoples imagination. Its a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts - A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep1
programme.desc: Start of Trauma Season - Scramble as the ER team tends to a spring flood of patients. Watch vet Phil stabilize an ailing joey as the rescue team fends off a rude kangaroo. Shadow senior vet Tim, who treats a cat-scratched bandicoot and snakes a keelback out of a grate.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep2
programme.desc: Operation Pelican - Head out with rescuer Jo to scoop up a pelican whos swallowed a fish hook, then see Sam free a newborn bat tangled in a fence. Follow vet Tim, who aids a surly koala with an eye infection, and watch a lumpy python give newbie Ruby a load of trouble.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Brisbane Raid - Chase the team as they triage patients from a hoarding case, then free a tangled-up ibis with rescue officers Jo and Chantelle. Check on a baby koala that took a swan dive with vet Mel and play the waiting game with a deadly eastern brown snake.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep3
programme.desc: King Kasper - Even orangutans have to watch what they eat. Find out if Beni can stick to a leafy green diet (and stop stealing food). See what kind of tasty treats Lanting can find while skipping class. And watch as Rebecca prepares to return to a truly wild life.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Misfits - Theres watery fun with group two as they visit group threes flooded classroom. Ayu, Ruthie, and Kesi take a step closer to release. And the arrival of Alba - the worlds rarest orangutan - creates a sensation at Orangutan Jungle School.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep4

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spring - In Southern Africa, Spring starts in early September and the natural world stirs into life. Days begin to lengthen, temperatures rise, and animals and plants combine in an orchestrated effort to reproduce, give birth and raise their young.

programme.title: Wildlife ER 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Gutsy Koala - Shadow vet Bec, who patches up dog-bitten koala Rachel, and new vets Ruby and Kerryn, who soothe a pack of itchy possums. Free a pair of kookaburras trapped in a wall with rescue officer Dani and watch vet Tims squirrel glider knee surgery.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Relentless Sun - A once-in-a-generation drought has sucked all the moisture from surrounding rivers and the conservation team is struggling to keep up with the swath of thirsty creatures. While some animals succumb to dehydration, the team must concentrate its efforts on a particularly vulnerable - and dangerous - water buffalo.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Predjama - Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom - For most of the year its a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep5
programme.desc: De Hoop: Place of Hope - This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africas wilderness.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Kogelberg - Considered to be the most beautiful of the Capes protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Collisions - Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lady Elliot Island - Lady Elliot Island is the crown jewel of the Great Barrier Reef- the largest living structure on Earth. This southern-most island of the Reef chain is home to dizzying swirls of colour, life and diversity both above and below the water.

programme.title: Australia's Hidden Islands 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Kangaroo Island - Kangaroo Island, off the southern coast of Australia, is an ocean fortress cut off by wild seas and battered by brutal Southern Ocean winds. Its an enchanted refuge where some of the most iconic mainland fauna have made a last stand.

programme.title: Ireland's Wild Islands with Eoin Warner 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sea of Serpents - Begin on Rathlin, where flightless guillemot chicks take a leap of faith and golden hares welcome the dawn. Head to Tory to see basking sharks, dolphins, and the endangered corncrakes dance of love. Then chase adorable Irish stoats across Achill.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Snares Islands/ Tini Heke - Venture to the pristine wilderness of the Snares Islands, a remote animal sanctuary protected from the turbulent sea. Hop along with a colony of Snares crested penguins, soar with giant petrels and sooty shearwaters, and roar with giant sea lions.

programme.title: Beasts of the Big Blue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Otago Peninsula/ Muaupoko - Set sail for New Zealands Otago Peninsula, a breeding refuge for endangered seabirds and marine mammals. Watch as sea lions, albatrosses, red-billed gulls, white-fronted terns, and fairy prions find mates, then nurture the next generation.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Village Raiders - Leopard problems plague the community as hunger-ravaged predators roam dangerously close to nearby villages. The team at Ol Pejeta need to safely snare a leopard and relocate it for the good of man and beast.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom - For most of the year its a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: MTV Rewind: 2011
programme.desc: Step into the MTV Time Machine and travel back to 2011 to check out what tracks were stealing our hearts and ruling the charts!

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the others daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep51
programme.desc: Can't Hardly Bait / Crood Detente - After Womp is told he can't attend the upcoming school ceremony, Thunk makes it his personal mission to get Womp to pass every subject before the ceremony; When the Valleyites disagree with letting the Broods move to Ahhh! Valley, Grug throws a giant party to force them to become best friends

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep4
programme.desc: Lucky And The Competition Conundrum - When Lucky and Pru find themselves on opposing teams for a school fundraiser their competitive streaks emerge and their friendship is tested

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep50
programme.desc: Scare Bud / All Harvey's Eve - There's an uninvited guest at the Bow's house: a not-so-scary ghost named Casper. On Halloween, Lotta tries to win a spooky storytelling contest.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep50
programme.desc: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F - The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep28
programme.desc: Switched! / Free Range Chickens - Archibald and Cheryl accidentally swap bodies. They must each go through the others daily routine, with Archibald pretending to be Cheryl and vice versa, until they can undo the mix up. / When the Strutters go camping, they find a tribe of primitive cave chickens. After Archibald gives them a parting gift, he unknowingly changes their course in history.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep57
programme.desc: A Matter Of Perspective - The Riders follow the aging Eruptodon to the sacred Dragon Graveyard, but soon find themselves trapped by the fearsome Sentinel dragons who guard the graveyard

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep68
programme.desc: Lost And Foundlings - When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep47
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Aggravated Assault Of The Alien Armada - Oh, the indignity: George and Harold are forced to perform spa treatments on gigantic Biglyans. Also, Dr. Fitzgibbons reveals a shocking secret.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and The Frenzied Farts of Flabby Flabulous - George and Harold create a comic book about their gym teacher, but after a freak accident turns fantasy into reality, the best friends must run from his revenge

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep31
programme.desc: Snow Day / Guy Misses Out - It only snows one day a year in Troll Village, and Poppy, Branch, and Smidge want to make the most of it. Poppy tries to finally get in a hit in her annual snowball fight with Peppy; Branch is determined to make up for the snow days he missed while in his bunker; Smidge tries to get first place in all of the Snow Day competitions./While waiting for the perfect time to make his big entrance at a party, Guy misses the formation of an inside joke. The Snack Pack tells him he just had to be there, but Guy sets out to understand the joke and get in on the laughter.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep5
programme.desc: The Gateway to The Desert - A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep58
programme.desc: Return Of Thor Bonecrusher - When Thor Bonecrusher is needed to rescue hostages taken by the Bandits, Snoutlout tries to help but accidentally brings to life Thor's evil twin Anti-Thor who sides with the Bandits

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep57
programme.desc: A Matter Of Perspective - The Riders follow the aging Eruptodon to the sacred Dragon Graveyard, but soon find themselves trapped by the fearsome Sentinel dragons who guard the graveyard

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep5
programme.desc: Creepy Caterpillar/Code of Silence - When Twig introduces Leaf to his new caterpillar friend Josh, Leaf must overcome his debilitating fear of caterpillars in order to give Josh a chance. / Hot tempered Rabbit is sick of the noise from the Mighty Ones games, so he makes them a bet that they cant go for a whole day without making a sound. Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.
