Desperate to see them fail, Rabbit spends the entire day making secret attempts to get the Mighty Ones to talk.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep68
programme.desc: Lost And Foundlings - When the Duchess comes to town declaring that she is ready to start a family, the Orphans have a competition to see who will be the lucky adoptee

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep61
programme.desc: Pip's Playground - Pip is feeling bored and wants something new to play. Fifi has a brilliant idea and asks all the tots to help her build a playground for Pip as a surprise.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep62
programme.desc: Mud Sculptures - It has been raining and the garden is muddy. The tots decide to make mud sculptures. But what will they all do with the sculptures when they are finished?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep63
programme.desc: Stingo's Naughty Day - Stingo is bored and plays all manner of naughty tricks on the other tots. Fifi teaches Stingo that he will have more fun if he helps people rather than being mean to them.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep64
programme.desc: Shrinking Pip - The Tots are all measuring themselves. Pip hasn't grown much since he was last measured. How can he grow into a big strong gooseberry?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep9
programme.desc: Why Do Spiders Build Webs? - The friends are having a tidying up day. Frightened Baa doesn't like spiders or their webs but Jess helps him to stop being scared by working out that Spiders build webs to catch their supper, and Baa feels re-assured and happy. Spiders are rather nice, rather clean and rather clever.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep10
programme.desc: How Can We Bring The Outside Inside? - Poor Willow has a sore hoof and has to stay inside until it's better. She's really missing her orchard so Jess and Mimi are determined to bring something of the outside to Willow to cheer her up. A tree is too big and it's too late in the year for apples. Jess works out that they can make beautiful tree and leaf rubbings into a wonderful tree collage for the stable to remind Willow of her orchard.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep11
programme.desc: What's My Favourite Thing About Spring? - Mimi has promised Jess a special surprise if he can work out what he likes best about the Spring He finds out that there's blossom on the trees, fresh new grass, bright young flowers in the Springtime. But he decides his very favorite thing is the newly hatched very cute little baby birds which his friend Little Bird has been singing about all along.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep12
programme.desc: How Can I Hide Without Being Found? - Willow is the best hide-and-seek finder! Jess is determined to work out a way of hiding without Willow finding him! A trip to the pond where he discovers that both Horace and Sammy Snail are camouflaged leads him to work out that he too can do the same to hide from Willow at last!

programme.title: Olivia Ep19
programme.desc: Olivia Leads A Parade - As Mother tries to get baby William to sleep, Olivia, Ian and Julian create a backyard parade. When Francine finds out, she decides she's going to make her OWN parade. Olivia eventually sees that two parades can be better than one and even figures out how to keep fussy William asleep.

programme.title: Olivia Ep20
programme.desc: Olivia Tends To The Sick - Julian comes down with a case of itchyfootitis, so it's Dr. Olivia to the rescue, with all kinds of silly treatments. When the condition begins to spread to others, Olivia imagines herself running an entire itchy foot clinic, and eventually discovers the perfect cure.

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep9
programme.desc: Why Monkeys Swing In The Trees - You see there was a time when Monkey used to play on the ground and he loved to wind up Crocodile. One day the Big Rains came and Monkey got stranded up the Mango Tree. Nasty Crocodile promised to take him to dry land. But only in exchange for one thing. His HEART! Monkey tricked Crocodile and when Crocodile found out that Monkey swapped his heart for a measley mango, he chased Monkey up a tree. From that day on Monkey swings in the trees keeping well clear of Crocodiles angry snaps! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep10
programme.desc: Why Tickbird Sits On Hippos Back - You see there was a time when Tickbird didn't sit on Hippo's back, infact they weren't friends at all! Tickbird was sick of Hippo splashing all the time. One day tiny Tickbird challenges big Hippo to a contest who can drink the most water in a single gulp! Tickbird outwits Hippo by using the tides and from that day she is allowed to sit on Hippo's back and pick off all the yummy ticks she can eat! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep11
programme.desc: Why Frog Croaks - You see there was a time when Frog didn't croak. Frog sang like a bird and the birds didn't like it. Birds were the masters of song and that's the way it should be! So the birds trick poor old Frog into a singing duel and sing and sing and sing until poor old Frog's voice is reduced to a rebbit. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep12
programme.desc: Why Spider Has A Tiny Waist - You see there was a time when Spider didn't have a tiny waist. She was all big and round and did she like her food! One day greedy Spider hears of Four Feasts in Tinga Tinga and she wanted to go to them all! So she spun four threads and attached them to various animals going to the feasts. But the Monkeys, Frog, Hippo and the Bees all set off in different directions North, South, East and West and Spider's thread soon runs out. EEeeek! The threads get tighter and tighter and tighter, making Spider's smaller and smaller and smaller! Luckily the threads break, but from that day on Spider has always had a tiny waist. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep14
programme.desc: Raiders of the Lost Bark / Slow, Dog. Slow! - When Tag and Scooch break Gilbers ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep13
programme.desc: Photo Day Disaster / The Eightful Eight - When Rodney heads to the Community Center for Junior Security Cadet picture day, TZG secretly helps him stay neat and clean for the photo shoot. / When Luis worries about his first ever math test, TZG secretly helps steady his nerves.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep1
programme.desc: A Cause for The Paws - Po, at the top of his game but lonely, comes across two weasels stealing an earthquake causing gauntlet and tries to stop them, but inadvertently destroys a town. He loses his title as Dragon Master and teams up with Wandering Blade, a knight on a mission from England, to track down the weasels and get his title back.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep37
programme.desc: Unbecoming - Jim is given the chance to see what life would be like if he had never picked up the Amulet

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia Ep38
programme.desc: Mistrial And Error - Jim must go to trial for releasing Gunmar from the Darklands

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep11
programme.desc: Unholy Dragon Returns to the Mountains - Jindiao takes Po and the kids hostage in an attempt to locate the Wellspring

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep12
programme.desc: Sacrifice at the Edge of Time - The kids are desperate to get back and help their fellow Panda Villagers, and Po decides he must figure out a way to defeat Jindiao before he controls the world

She shows him the lovely pots of honey she has and he wonders why bees need to make it. He thinks maybe Jess wonders if it might be used as glue but when Horace singing him a groovy song about HOW honey is made, Jess has an idea that it might be used as food during the winter when there's no pollen..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep14

He tries everything he can think of to get the Owl to hoot until he works out that it was nightime when he last heard the owl, so it he waits til it's night again we might just all get to hear the lovely sound of the Owl.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Musical Instruments - Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig find a box of instruments in the attic, and Peppa and George try them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Frogs and Worms and Butterflies - Frogs and Worms and Butterflies: Peppa and George play at being pretty butterflies, wriggly worms and muddy frogs.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Anna's Horse - Anna joins her friends to a game of riddle. Not only can she not "neigh" like a horse, she can't even make a loud sound. Bubu helps Anna with a Horse toy that makes the perfect "neigh" sound- perfect plan until they lose control of the toy!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep131
programme.desc: The Box of Secrets - Froga is discussing the notion of secrets with Christopher. She can't keep secrets as they are a burden for her. Anna makes a secrets box where all the friends put their secret inside to feel better!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep309
programme.desc: Mailtime Mystery - It's a busy delivery day for Mailbox and there's a special letter that needs to be delivered, but he doesn't know who it is for! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who the letter is for.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Steel Antlers / Berry Bad - Sir Steel dons fake antlers to join the Deer Squad as they plan a surprise birthday party for Tina Turtle. // Sir Steel is infuriated when berries stain his new coat. Deer Squad must stop his mech-feet stamp stompers from destroying the berry bushes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep227
programme.desc: Paddington's Birthday Treat Part 1/ Part 2 - The Browns take Paddington to London as a special treat for his birthday but they lose him on the way! // Paddington ends up in the Tower of London & has a close encounter with the Crown Jewels, a Beefeater and a Royal couple!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep606
programme.desc: Pups and the Stinky Bubble Trouble / Pups Save the Baby Ostriches - What's that smell? A strange odor is chasing the jungle animals away from their homes. // Olivia the Ostrich has fallen in to the canyon! The pups need to work together to lift her to safety, while keeping her soon-to-hatch eggs warm.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep607
programme.desc: Pups Save Gustavo's Guitar / Pups Save the Yoga Goats - Gustavo Goodway's guitar is missing. The pups need to find it before tonight's campfire concert! // Farmer Yumi's new Yoga Goat class is a hit, until her goats go missing! It's up to the Paw Patrol to find the goats and return them to Yumi's farm.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep110
programme.desc: New Squid on the Block / Boss Bissy / To BFF or Not to BFF - When a new kid starts at school, Bossy does everything to make sure they have a good time. // Bossy wishes he was older like his big sister. // Bossy and Turtle fail to get a perfect score on a bestie quiz.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: A Tail Of Two Fathers / The Welcome Wagon - It's a battle of the dads when Grandpa and Daddy can't agree on the best way to camp. // When Baby's new neighbor doesn't like him, Baby pulls out all the stops to change his mind.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Lucky Necklace / Vigo's Surprise - Baby struggles to let go of his lucky necklace when the time comes to pass it along to somefishy else. // Super Shark and Captain Kelp spot Vigo doing errands around town and are convinced he's hatching a sinister plot.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep220
programme.desc: Nacho Supreme / Sea Cow - Toms's new pet friend, Nacho, shows off his special skills when the crew goes on a daring rescue mission to save Kiko. // The crew must stop Bonnie Bones' latest quest for treasure when she disrupts a manatee habitat with a sticky invention.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Princess and the Pirate Puppy - Santi and crew will have to team up with a pirate puppy to stop Bonnie Bones and save an old friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Dressing Up - Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Secrets - Mummy Pig gives Peppa a box, which has to be kept a secret.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: New Shoes - Peppa loses her shoes, but she gets new red ones. Now she is so happy in them, that she refuses to take them off.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The School Fete - Peppa and her family go to the school fair, and do lots of stuff while they're there. Peppa and her friends get their faces painted as tigers.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Mummy Pig's Birthday - It is Mummy Pig's birthday, and Peppa, George and Daddy Pig are planning a surprise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep122
programme.desc: The Tooth Fairy - Peppa loses her tooth, so she puts the tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy, but she worries that she might be mean.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep706
programme.desc: The Snowflake Games - It's a head-to-head showdown when Blaze and Crusher enter... The Snowflake Games! Who will win the most winter sports and receive the prized Snowflake Medal?

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and its secret stash of treats.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep907
programme.desc: Pups Save the Tooth Fairy / Pups Solve the Mystery of the Missing Art - Julius loses his tooth and has a dream that the Paw Patrol saves a bumbling Tooth Fairy. // When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Deep Goo Sea - William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep226
programme.desc: Paddington Loves Windsor Gardens / Paddington Helps a Hedgehog - Paddington & the Kids overhear Mr. Brown talking about selling the house! Will they really have to leave Windsor Gardens? // The kids are playing in the garden & make a prickly discovery. Something is not right so Paddington asks Baaz to help.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep310
programme.desc: Blue's Storytime with Camila - We dive deeper into American Sign Language and the Deaf community. Camila the librarian wants to tell a story with us using ASL, but what story? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep623
programme.desc: Campfire Stories - It's a campout under the stars! Blaze, AJ, Starla, Crusher, and Pickle are gathered around the campfire to tell the most amazing stories they can make up! And the best part? Whoever tells the best story wins the last marshmallow!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island / The Lost Treasure of Merlandia - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it. // When Anani learns of a treasure chest filled with magic pearls, she enlists the help of the Pirate Protectors to find it.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Missing Falcon / Happy Bestie-versary / The Tumminator - Bossy and Turtle go full gumshoe to find Bissy's missing plushy. // Bossy and Turtle decide to exchange gifts for their first annual friendship anniversary. // Bossy and Turtle have to face the scariest ride ever at Wacky Wacky World: The Tumminator!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S09 Ep924
programme.desc: Pups Save a Jukebox - Mayor Humdinger steals a jukebox so he can play an annoying song all day long. Chase and Rubble track it down to save the records.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep129
programme.desc: Pancakes - Mummy Pig makes pancakes, and Peppa and George help, but Daddy Pig flips his pancake so high it sticks to the ceiling.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep130
programme.desc: Babysitting - Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig look after Peppa and George while Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig go out for the evening. Peppa and George are too excited to sleep and Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig play games with them to tire them out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Garden Games - Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep617
programme.desc: Going Boating - Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, Miss Rabbit has all sorts of boats for hire. All the families have a race and Daddy Pig wishes he hadn't picked a boat which has to be peddled.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep208

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty / Pups Save a Pony - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town. // Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Popcorn - Tiny Chef hosts movie night for friends and turns his tree stump into a popcorn machine to pop enough for everyone!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep610
programme.desc: Pups Save a Manatee / Pups Save Breakfast - Farmer Al and Farmer Yumi need help from the PAW Patrol to a get a manatee to the swamp. // Mr. Porter and Alex are in a sticky situation - they're up to their ears in maple syrup! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save the Porter's and Breakfast!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep611
programme.desc: Pups Save the Land Pirates / Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots - Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-ARR-letta, are sent sailing into the desert and got lost! It's up to the PAW Patrol to save these Land pirates. // Cap'n Turbot and Francois chirp for help when a bird-watching contest leaves them up in the air.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Turtle Tour / Honey Bear / The Science Pair - Turtle gives Gran-Gran a tour of his favorite amusement park. // When Bossy's cousin Honey Bear comes to visit, he struggles to be a a good friend. // Bossy and Turtle try to make the coolest science fair project so they can become hall monitors.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Fort Fin-ship / Water Buggin - When Baby and his friends build a clubhouse, Hank has no idea what to put in his personal nook. // When a noisy water bug takes up residence in the Shark's home, the family will do whatever it takes to reclaim the peace and quiet they lost.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Call Me Billiam / The Finship Trap - When Rayna asks William to be more responsible, he sets out to become a grownup fishy named Billiam. // When Baby discovers Hank and Goldie aren't speaking to each other, he concocts an elaborate plan to bring them back together.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep201
programme.desc: The Stones of Power - When Santiago and his crew race to protect the magical Stones of Power from being taken by Bonnie Bones, they discover more than they bargained for. Luckily, they receive a little help from their hero -- Capitn Calavera!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep105
programme.desc: Caracol Cove - Enrique's new gold-digging machine threatens Lorelai's home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep134
programme.desc: Lunch - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch. Granny Pig has made a salad but George doesn't like vegetables, so Grandpa Pig makes the salad into a dinosaur shape to help George eat his salad.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Flying a Kite - Peppa and George go outside to fly their kite, but the kite gets stuck in a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep135
programme.desc: Camping - Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep136
programme.desc: Sleepy Princess - Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Tree House - Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep138
programme.desc: Fancy Dress Party - Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen - Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep601
programme.desc: Big Rig to the Rescue! - When three big deliveries are needed all over Axle City, there's only one monster machine with the power to haul it all: Big Rig Blaze! But even Big Rig Blaze may not be able to make all the deliveries in time.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep602
programme.desc: The Amazing Stunt Kitty - When a big stunt goes awry, Darington is sent flying away on an out-of-control balloon! Now, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Darington's sidekick Stunt Kitty to save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep921
programme.desc: Pups Save a Flamingo Dancer / Pups Save a Mayor and Her Mini - The Paw Patrol searches for Julia, Julius and a flamingo when they go missing from a dance contest. // The Paw Patrol comes to the rescue when Mayor Goodway and her niece Julia get stuck on a runaway art installation.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep922
programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. // When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Paddington Finds A Pigeon / Paddington and Chores List - Paddington nurses a sick bird named Pigeonton back to health, but can he let him go? // The family all have chores except Paddington. So as not to be excluded, Mr. Brown creates a list for him to follow, but Paddington picks up the wrong list.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep405
programme.desc: Firefighter Blue to the Rescue! - Josh and Blue suit up to be firefighter helpers for the day! As we play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help the firefighters, we train for duty at the fire house, learn about fire safety, and ride Fiery Truck on a special rescue mission!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Superwheels! - Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep219
programme.desc: Giddy-Up Games / The Golden Guitar - The crew agree to play a series of cowboy-themed games against the villainous Barbarito in an attempt to win a treasure. // Toms breaks his guitar while trying to retrieve the golden guitar of his idol and learns that music comes from within.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep126
programme.desc: The Masked Fishy / The Best Friends Game - When a mysterious masked fish is causing trouble for Goldie's magnum opus, Detective Baby Shark must catch the culprit. // When Vigo and Costello enter a gameshow to win an evil prize, Super Shark and Captain Kelp sign up to stop them on live TV.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep104
programme.desc: Turtle's Shell Day / The Way of the Gran-Gran / The Spring Kick-off Games - Bossy plans a Shell Day party for Turtle without considering what Turtle wants. // Bossy and Turtle learn how to be patient from the Master. // Gran-Gran; Bossy is tired of losing at the Spring Kickoff Games.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. // During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save a Hot Potato - Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep131
programme.desc: Ballet Lesson - Peppa goes to her first ballet lesson, and meets her friends there. She decides to teach Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig to dance but finds out they have some moves of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep132
programme.desc: Thunderstorm - Peppa and George are having a picnic, when a thunderstorm starts. They go inside, but Peppa and George are still scared because the thunderstorm is making lots of noise.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep133
programme.desc: Cleaning the Car - Peppa and her family have to wash the car when it gets dirty.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep404
programme.desc: Magenta's Thank You Day Surprise - It's Thank You Day and our friends Miranda and Magenta are coming over to celebrate! When Magenta's picture of what she's thankful for gets ruined, we play a special game of Magenta's Clues to figure out what she's thankful for!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save Old Trusty / Pups Save a Pony - Ryder and the pups need to unplug Old Trusty the geyser to stop water sprouting up all over town. // Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Pups Save a Space Rock - Everest, the Turbots and a Space Rock get trapped in a cave.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Muffin in space / Fizzy Frenzy - Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.desc: Paddington and The Magic Trick / Paddington and Poor Mr Curry - Mr. Gruber gives Paddington a box of Magic tricks, but Paddington cannot master the tricks until he learns to practice, practice, practice. // Mr. Curry is ill and Paddington decides to nurse him back to health with his own recipe for onion soup.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep65
programme.desc: Honk Honk - The Teletubbies hear a 'honk honk' in the distance and the Tubby Car approaches. The Tubby Car drives the Teletubbies across Teletubbyland as they sing the Tubby Car song.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep10
programme.desc: Shorts - Dee encourages a friend to say 'shorts' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see all sorts of shorts - red shorts, stripy shorts, kick it really far shorts and flamingo shorts!

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Shshsh!!! - It's Hack-Po's day off and she wants to read her book... if only she can get a bit of "shshsh!!!"

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep13
programme.desc: It's Time For a Boat Ride - JoJo and Gran Gran bump into Ned and Monty as they walk along the canal. Ned invites them onboard to go on a boat ride, where JoJo gets to act as captain - on the lookout for treasure!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep68
programme.desc: Pretend Piggy - Monty is told off when he behaves like a pig, literally, and decides to roll in the mud. This makes him think about why people can't act like animals.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Surprising Stan - Monty wonders whether it is okay to give away surprises when his mother starts to plan a special treat for Stan.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Squash - When dad and Uncle Stripe play a game of squash, Bluey and Bingo are in control of their every move, and Bingo proves that big siblings don't always beat little siblings.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Super Squirrel Badge - The squirrels decide they want to be super squirrels and find themselves special outfits and 'super' names.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Rescue Badge - Enid the cat gets stuck when she chases a mouse up a tree, so Duggee and the squirrels rescue her.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Summer Holiday Badge - The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a migrating bird fall from the sky - suitcase and all!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep49
programme.desc: Meteorite Mayhem, Wolfe Creek Crater, Australia - The Go Jetters discover what made the Wolfe Creek Crater - a meteorite.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep48
programme.desc: Puffin Patrol, Iceland - The Westman Islands are home to one of the largest colonies of puffins in the world! Once a year puffins return to the land to lay a single egg.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Hammerbarn - On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Manatees - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to crystal river in Florida, North America, to find out how manatees survive the cold water in winter.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales S2 Ep15
programme.desc: Heckie the dog - Rory visits Patrick and his pet dog Heckie who is going to the vets to have his ears syringed. Ferne joins the vet who helps look after military animals.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Fool's Jewel - Captain Captain is determined to keep a hold of the jewels today, but during a surprise jewel inspection she discovers that Cook and Line have lost the blue jewel.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Hair Badge - Duggee is having a bad hair day, so the squirrels and Norrie decide to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Cake Badge - The rabbits are very upset when Happy eats their cake, so Duggee decides to make them a new one with the help of the squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Drawing Badge - It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Symbiosis Shrink Down - The Go Jetters learn about 'symbiosis' - when two different animals or plants help each other.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep46
programme.desc: Mission Manatee, USA - The Go Jetters are in the Gulf of Mexico to learn about Manatees, peaceful water mammals that spend most of their time either sleeping or eating sea-grass.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep2
programme.desc: Henry's Magic Box - All of the engines become excited as the winter holidays arrive. Henry goes to deliver a special package to a field; he wonders what it contains.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Old Toys - Duck is bored of his toy collection, so he and Sarah search for old toys in the attic.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Basking Shark - Sarah is keen to adopt a sea creature, but doesn't get her first choice...

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Spring Sheep - It's spring! But the sheep can't take off their hot winter jumpers.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Dog Loves Time Travel - Pug wants to go back in time and our two adventurers visit an inventor who has a time machine. But each time they try to use the machine something goes wrong.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep66
programme.desc: Know It All - Monty and his best friend pet pig Jimmy Jones dance and sing to a song about creatures who seem to know it all.

programme.title: Dinopaws S1 Ep35
programme.desc: The Things We Can Be - The Dinopaws are playing at being the moon and the sea when they disturb Baby Sitter Dino

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Panorama Populara - Po really wants to enjoy a picnic on Tinpotown Hill but the picnic bench is always full.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Float My Boat - A Blocker delivers a boat to Lake Street instead of the lake. Can Team Tinpo ship it back to where it belongs?

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Daddy Robot - Bluey and Bingo don't want to tidy the playroom, so they get Daddy Robot to do it. But when Bluey takes things too far, Daddy Robot malfunctions!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep20
programme.desc: The Same Badge - As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep19
programme.desc: The Delivery Badge - Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep18
programme.desc: The Eating Badge - The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep45
programme.desc: Endangered Species, So Paulo, Brazil - The Go Jetters are upset after hearing of the species that need help. Ubercorn tries to cheer them up by planning a visit to the forests of Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: The Numtums S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Switcheroo - Dar Dar and Gladdy decide to play swapsies! But will Gumnut Gorge survive the havoc when they turn everything upside down?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on whats happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Travelogue

programme.title: The World Today

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Voice Referendum Explained Ep3

programme.desc: Distinguished Professor Marcia Langton, Anthropologist, Geographer and Academic addresses the National Press Club.

programme.title: Landline Ep30
programme.desc: A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep32
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast: Early Ep37
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Kathryn Robinson and Jeremy Fernandez, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast Ep37
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus finance with David Chau and sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders Ep31
programme.desc: David Speers and a panel of leading political analysts and commentators examine the political events of the week including the ASEAN Summit and G20 in India, and look ahead to the issues on the agenda as parliament resumes.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep35
programme.desc: It's Finals time in the AFL and NRL. Kelli Underwood and a panel of experts unpack all the action from the AFL Qualifying and Elimination Finals, the opening weekend of the NRL Finals, the Rugby World Cup and US Open tennis.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep34
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: ABC News Ep73
programme.desc: More news, more often. Wherever you are stay in touch throughout the day with ABC News. We bring you the headlines and latest on the day's top stories, plus breaking news and live reports from the scene as events unfold.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep12
programme.desc: Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea cover the stories that matter to the Pacific, drawing on a network of journalists with deep regional expertise, featuring correspondents in Suva, Honiara and other locations across the Pacific.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep73
programme.desc: Miriam Corowa presents the latest from ABC News, following today's top stories and coverage of events as they unfold. Plus original reporting, expert analysis and all the updated news, sport, weather and information you need.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep20
programme.desc: Erica Packer, former wife of billionaire James Packer, opens up about the deadly genetic mystery shadowing her family and the scientists working to crack the code for thousands more Australians.

programme.title: AFLW Ep9
programme.desc: Collingwood welcome Fremantle to their spiritual home ground Victoria Park, for Round 2 action in the AFLW.

programme.title: AFLW Ep10
programme.desc: The North Melbourne-Tasmanian Kangaroos take on the Carlton Blues in Round 2 of the AFLW at Arden Street in Melbourne.

programme.title: Landline Ep31
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Folau Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of one our most gifted and controversial athletes and how a social media post landed him in the heart of our culture wars. Part 1 traces Folau's family background and his rise to the top of the Rugby world.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep73
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia. (Final)

programme.title: Our Law Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - With a crucial fitness test standing in the way of finishing their cadetship, the cadets make their final push towards graduating. The frontline police officers each make life-changing decisions.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam War Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - 'A Popular War' shows how Australia became entangled in the war, how sending conscripted soldiers won widespread support but forever changed lives and how the first stirrings of dissent started to appear.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Treasures Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A year in the life of Kakadu in Australia's Top End. Aaron Pedersen explains the six seasons recognised by the Bininj people and reveals the web of relationships between its species and the environment.

programme.title: Compass Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Michael Mohammed Ahmad is one of Australia's most exciting emerging writers. Founder of the Sweatshop writers' collective in Western Sydney, he's proof that the pen is mightier than the sword.

programme.title: Art Works Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Namila's at Melbourne's NGV International; singer-songwriter Jen Cloher discusses their new album; cultural objects return to lutruwita for an important new exhibition at TMAG; and a performance by slam-poet Thabani Tshuma.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep20
programme.desc: Erica Packer, former wife of billionaire James Packer, opens up about the deadly genetic mystery shadowing her family and the scientists working to crack the code for thousands more Australians.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep73
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC273VolkanovskivsTheKoreanZombie
programme.desc: UFC 273 featured UFC featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski carve out his legacy as one of the best ever as he faces The Korean Zombie. Plus, a heated rivalry in the co-main event as Aljamain Sterling and Petr Yan rematch for the undisputed bantamweight title. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel The Last Stylebender Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert The Reaper Whittaker. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC274OliveiravsGaethje
programme.desc: Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts EpBlackHistoryMonthIncredibleKnockouts

programme.title: 2023 Gran Premi Monster Energy de Catalunya Highlights EpHighlights

On a quest to return to the top of the division, Gane scored a blistering third-round knockout of Tai Tuivasa in his hometown in the UFCs first visit to France in 2022, and hes looking for a repeat against Spivac, who enters this bout on a three-fight winning streak, most recently finishing Derrick Lewis in a single round

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland EpPrelims
programme.desc: Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.
